description: The case sparked a five-part Investigation Discovery true crime series.

description: The popular conservative host had requested an audience with the pope and “was granted a spot quickly.”

title: Supreme Court Upholds Ban on Transgender Youth Care, Concerning Hollywood Activists
description: In a political climate in which stars are shying away from the spotlight on divisive issues, Elliot Page, Nicole Maines and Lilly Wachowski urged the justices to affirm "live-saving" healthcare for transgender youth.

title: The Outrageous 20-Year-Old Movie That Predicted Trump’s America
description: In 2004 ‘A Day Without a Mexican’ was intended to be a political satire. In 2025 it seems all too real. Plus, Joel Grey auctions off his old lederhosen (and some nudes!) TikTok star Khaby Lame demands $1.2 million to talk, and Chet Hanks is a no-show at his book reading.

title: BBC Names Kate Phillips Chief Content Officer, Succeeding Charlotte Moore
description: Phillips has worked at the BBC for over 12 years — most recently as director of unscripted, where she commissioned some of the channel's top shows, including 'Strictly Come Dancing' and 'The Traitors.'

title: Chappell Roan Admits She Does “Give a F***” About the Backlash She Receives
description: "I don’t know if it will ever feel okay to hear someone say something really hateful about me," the Grammy winner admits.
